description: This unit introduces students to the audio-visual language of multimedia and multimedia design principles. The role of the screen-based multimedia designer and the various multimedia elements are defined, including text, image, sound, narrative, animation and video. Students are introduced to various methods for creating screen design for contemporary electronic media communication. Particular emphasis is placed on the role of text and images in its particular narrative process.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
